page.title: 18RELIGION K. MALZEARD AREA
page.content: Each village has an{Anglican Church and{Methodist Chapel.}United Services are held and there are joint{Sunday {Schools.}Grewelthorpe Methodist Church has 24 members and the Minister is Rev M Staton. There is 1 service every Sunday. In Kirkby Malzeard the Methodist Pastoral Assistant is Mr S Cooper and there are 28 members. The Anglican Churches of{St.James Grewelthorpe and{St Andrews}at Kirkby Malzeard share 2 priests who serve 7 churches in the surrounding area.There is a special project to train local people in the conducting of their own services.The Priests are Rev P Garner & Rev A Atkinson.There are 42 members in the Grewelthorpe church.There are members of other Christian denominations who go out of the area to worship & many people who do not attend any place of worship.
